components.templateData:
<dialog open class="bmb_calendar-event-modal">
  @if (!!event) {
    <bmb-student-activity-card
      [startDate]="getDateFromString(event().event.start)"
      [endDate]="getDateFromString(event().event.end)"
      [title]="event().event.title"
      [detail]="event().event.detail"
      [type]="event().event.type"
      [modalTitle]="event().event.modalTitle"
      [status]="event().event.status"
      (closeModal)="handleCloseModal()"
    />
  }
</dialog>

components.name: BmbLoginOnboardingStepperStepTwoComponent
components.template:

  title="Paso 2"
  subtitle="Ingresa tu ToTP"
  label="Recuerda que debes contar con la aplicacin de identificacin"
  sublabel="(Google/Microsoft Authenticator)"
  cancelBackLabel="Anterior "
  continueLabel="Siguiente"
  [isContinueDisable]="isContinueDisable()"
  (handleContinue)="_handleContinueStep()"
>
  <bmb-totp
    instanceId="toTP"
    [maxCode]="maxCode"
    [codeError]="getCodeError()"
    [errorMessage]="getErrorMessage()"
    (handleSubmit)="verifyCode($event)"
  />
</bmb-login-onboarding-stepper-step>

components.name: BmbProgressCircleComponent
components.templateData:
<svg
  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  onkeypress=""
  class="bmb_progress-circle"
  [attr.viewBox]="svg.viewBox"
  preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet"
  [attr.height]="svg.height"
  [attr.width]="svg.width"
>
  @if (this.showBackground) {
    <ng-container>
      <circle
        class="bmb_progress-circle-background"
        [attr.cx]="svg.backgroundCircle.cx"
        [attr.cy]="svg.backgroundCircle.cy"
        [attr.r]="svg.backgroundCircle.r"
      />
    </ng-container>
  }
  <circle
    class="bmb_progress-circle-fill"
    [attr.cx]="svg.circle.cx"
    [attr.cy]="svg.circle.cy"
    [attr.r]="svg.circle.r"
    [attr.stroke-width]="svg.circle.strokeWidth"
  />
  <path
    class="bmb_progress-circle-track"
    [attr.d]="svg.path.d"
    [attr.stroke-width]="svg.path.strokeWidth"
    [attr.fill]="svg.path.fill"
  />
  @if (options.showTitle || options.showValueLabel) {
    <text
      alignment-baseline="baseline"
      [attr.x]="svg.circle.cx"
      [attr.y]="svg.circle.cy"
      [attr.text-anchor]="svg.title.textAnchor"
    >
      @if (options.showTitle) {
        <ng-container>
          @for (tspan of svg.title.tspans; track tspan) {
            <tspan
              class="bmb_progress-circle-title"
              [attr.x]="svg.title.x"
              [attr.y]="svg.title.y"
              [attr.dy]="tspan.dy"
            >
              {{ tspan.span }}
            </tspan>
          }
        </ng-container>
      }
      @if (options.showValueLabel) {
        <ng-container>
          @for (tspan of svg.valueLabel.tspans; track tspan) {
            <tspan
              class="bmb_progress-circle-value-label"
              [attr.x]="svg.valueLabel.x"
              [attr.y]="svg.valueLabel.y"
              [attr.dy]="tspan.dy"
            >
              {{ tspan.span }}
            </tspan>
          }
        </ng-container>
      }
    </text>
  }
</svg>
